body:
Release Notes

Network360 Team

The Network360 Team is pleased to bring you a Recruitment enhancement and a bug fix for Create a List.

Enhancements

Recruitment
  • As clients will not be recruiting providers to the Dental Universe, we have removed this as possible selection for the target network. This will also help to prevent a performance issue.

Fixes

Create a List
  • Now, an error message no longer occurs when you view the details for a provider search based on provider tags or provider location tags.
